skins.shipDescription: Atlanta-class light cruiser ¨C Atlanta, Hull Number CL-51!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the anti-aircraft cruiser Atlanta... I was the flagship of the 10th and 11th Atlantic cruising fleet and I've taken part in nearly every military operation in the Pacific. Even the President has given me praise!
skins.acquisition: I'm the anti-aircraft cruiser Atlanta. Kept you waiting, huh, Commander? But from now on you can rest easy and let me handle everything!
skins.login: Commander, if you ever run into a problem, please tell me!
skins.details: Ah, Commander's looking... I have to behave like a big sister!
skins.secretaryIdle1: Not being a flagship sure is more peaceful...
skins.secretaryIdle2: San Francisco was terrible to me! Just once is tolerable for accidental friendly fire, but she shot me well over ten times!
skins.secretaryIdle3: Shooting down aircraft is my specialty. Want me to teach you how to do it, Commander?
skins.secretaryTouch: Mgh, don't touch me like that... My big sister image would be ruined!
